Probably the money that they saved from payroll by refusing to pay their workers a living wage... so that in addition to working they are still poor enough to qualify for public assistance... the result being that the rest of us taxpayers get to subsidize Wal-Mart's payroll . They also save money by refusing to have a large enough staff on duty to watch the floor and deter shoplifting... i guess you've never heard of the US black budget? i mean you're talking about two different animals here. Russia had just as many issues in Afghanistan as we did. guerilla warfare is always a threat to a large bulky military, that's how the Americans won the Revolutionary War for the most part. we had the same problems in Vietnam and in Iraq and Afghanistan. but wars between two """"equally"""" matched large nations are not even comparable. you're oversimplifying far too much. to win, they would have to invade us, not just repel an invasion. we DO have functional stealth, I'm surprised you dont realize that. we invented stealth almost forty years ago. China hasnt come close to matching our technology from 20 years ago. same with Russia. China has one advantage, a large army. Russia has one advantage, a more robust cyberwarfare department. in every other category, we are superior.
